Package com.phidgets

This package contains classes for each type of Phidget, as well as a Phidget Manager.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AccelerometerPhidget This class represents a Phidget Accelerometer.
AdvancedServoPhidget This class represents a Phidget Advanced Servo Controller.
AnalogPhidget This class represents a Phidget Analog.
BridgePhidget This class represents a Phidget Bridge.
Dictionary This class represents the Phidget Dictionary.
DictionaryKeyListener This class represents a key listener.
EncoderPhidget This class represents a Phidget Encoder.
FrequencyCounterPhidget This class represents a Phidget Frequency Counter.
GPSPhidget This class represents a Phidget GPS.
InterfaceKitPhidget This class represents a Phidget Interface Kit.
IRCode This class represents an IR Code.
IRCodeInfo This class represents IR Code Properties needed for transmit.
IRLearnedCode This class represents an IR Learned Code.
IRPhidget This class represents a Phidget IR.
LEDPhidget This class represents a Phidget LED.
Manager This class represents a Phidget Manager.
MotorControlPhidget This class represents a Phidget Motor Controller.
Phidget This is the base class from which all Phidget device classes derive.
PHSensorPhidget This class represents a Phidget PH Sensor.
RFIDPhidget This class represents a Phidget RFID Reader.
ServoPhidget This class represents a Phidget servo Controller.
SpatialEventData This class represents an a set of spatial data.
SpatialPhidget This class represents a Phidget Spatial.
StepperPhidget This class represents a Phidget Stepper Controller.
TemperatureSensorPhidget This class represents a Phidget temperature Sensor.
TextLCDPhidget This class represents a Phidget Text LCD.
TextLEDPhidget This class represents a Phidget Text LED.
WeightSensorPhidget This class represents a Phidget Weight Sensor.
 

Exception Summary
PhidgetException This class represents Phidget related exceptions.
 

Package com.phidgets Description

This package contains classes for each type of Phidget, as well as a Phidget Manager.
